languages.text: {n}Друкари презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Едва ли мандрагоры посмеют потребовать свое с меня. Если они придут за мной — пожалеют об этом решении". {n}Несмотря на уверенный тон, на лбу Маражая появляется тревожная складка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Друкари презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Едва ли мандрагоры посмеют потребовать свое с меня. Если они придут за мной — пожалеют об этом решении". {n}Несмотря на уверенный тон, на лбу Маражая появляется тревожная складка.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари презрительно фыркает.{/n} "Едва ли мандрагоры посмеют потребовать свое с меня. Если они придут за мной — пожалеют об этом решении". {n}Несмотря на уверенный тон, на лбу Маражая появляется тревожная складка.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "As if the Mandrakes would dare come for me to claim what they are owed. And if they do come, they will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "As if the Mandrakes would dare come for me to claim what they are owed. And if they do come, they will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

{n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "As if the Mandrakes would dare come for me to claim what they are owed. And if they do come, they will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}
{n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari se burla.{/n} «Que vengan a por lo que les debo. Lo lamentarán». {n}A pesar de la confianza de sus palabras, la preocupación hace que Marazhai frunza el ceño.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari se burla.{/n} «Que vengan a por lo que les debo. Lo lamentarán». {n}A pesar de la confianza de sus palabras, la preocupación hace que Marazhai frunza el ceño.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋哼了一声。{/n}“如果他们打算讨债，让他们尽管来吧，但他们一定会后悔。”{n}尽管玛拉斋的语气充满信心，但他还是不由自主地皱起了眉头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋哼了一声。{/n}“如果他们打算讨债，让他们尽管来吧，但他们一定会后悔。”{n}尽管玛拉斋的语气充满信心，但他还是不由自主地皱起了眉头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}デュカーリはフンッと鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「来るなら来ればいい。後悔するだけだ」{n}という自信に満ちた言葉にもかかわらず、マラズハイは不安を隠せぬ様子で眉間にしわを寄せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリはフンッと鼻を鳴らした。{/n}「来るなら来ればいい。後悔するだけだ」{n}という自信に満ちた言葉にもかかわらず、マラズハイは不安を隠せぬ様子で眉間にしわを寄せた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari s'esclaffe.{/n} « Libre à elles de venir réclamer leur dû, je les attends de pied ferme. » {n}Malgré son indifférence affectée, le front de Marazhai se plisse sous l'effet de l'inquiétude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari s'esclaffe.{/n} « Libre à elles de venir réclamer leur dû, je les attends de pied ferme. » {n}Malgré son indifférence affectée, le front de Marazhai se plisse sous l'effet de l'inquiétude.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari schnaubt.{/n} "Sollen sie sich holen kommen, was ich ihnen noch schulde. Sie werden es bereuen." {n}Trotz seiner selbstsicheren Worte runzelt Marazhai besorgt die Stirn.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari schnaubt.{/n} "Sollen sie sich holen kommen, was ich ihnen noch schulde. Sie werden es bereuen." {n}Trotz seiner selbstsicheren Worte runzelt Marazhai besorgt die Stirn.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, alaycı bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Buyursunlar sorsunlar. Hepsini bin pişman ederim." {n}Kendinden emin sözlerine rağmen Marazhai, endişeyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari scoffs.{/n} "Let them come for what they are owed. They will regret it." {n}Despite his self-assured words, concern brings a furrow to Marazhai's brow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Drukhari alaycı.{/n} "Gelsinler de sorsunlar bakalım. Hepsini pişman ederim." {n}Kendinden emin sözlerine rağmen Marazhai'ın kaşları endişeyle çatılıyor.{/n}
